title: Patch Notes
content: g companions. Fixed some clips and pops during the romantic night with Mizora. Fixed a pop on Ravengard when talking to him at camp. Fixed Astarion leaning too far forward when getting the artefact from Shadowheart. Fixed some issues with where characters are looking and standing when prompting Gale to see what's inside the Annals of Karsus. Fixed large races and characters with horns obscuring Mizora in certain shots when she visits Wyll at camp. Fixed a camera shot after giving food to the owl
